What are the treatments for carnitine-acylcarnitine translocase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of CACT deficiency:  - Baby's First Test  - FOD (Fatty Oxidation Disorders) Family Support Group: Diagnostic Approach to Disorders of Fat Oxidation - Information for Clinicians
